sentences.en: Avoid pork and suchlike indigestible food.
sentences.cn: 忌吃猪肉和这一类不消化的东西.

sentences.en: Because the product price is better, the price down, indigestible part cost and increasing factor.
sentences.cn: 因为我国产品的性价比比较好, 价格低些, 能消化一部分成本提高的因素.

sentences.en: Coarse, indigestible plant matter , consisting primarily of polysaccharides such as cellulose, that when eaten stimulates peristalsis.
sentences.cn: 含纤维多但营养低的粗糙食品; 它可刺激肠蠕动.
未熟的香蕉是难消化的.

sentences.en: He found the cold and hard food indigestible.
sentences.cn: 他发觉食物又冷又硬,难以消化.

sentences.en: Low caloric polydextrose also called indigestible dextrin , was a kind of water - solvable dietary fiber product.
sentences.cn: 低热量葡聚糖是 水溶性 食物纤维的一种.

sentences.en: Many Kosovars would be happy to be shot of indigestible north.
sentences.cn: 若放弃北部这块难以融合的地区,许多科索沃人会感到高兴.

sentences.en: Our stomach will reject indigestible foods.
sentences.cn: 我们的胃会把不能消化的食物呕吐出来.

sentences.en: The indigestible food set heavily on my stomach.
sentences.cn: 这些难消化的食物沉甸甸地压在我胃里.

sentences.en: The seeds are eaten together with the flesh, but they are indigestible unless chewed.
sentences.cn: 种子是和果肉一起吃的, 但是除非伱咀嚼它,它是不会被消化的.
胃拒纳难以消化的食物.
这是些很难理解的统计资料.

trans.tran_en: food that is indigestible cannot easily be broken down in the stomach into substances that the body can use
